name: career-fit-scoring-app
description: Electron desktop app for resume scoring using career-fit-scoring algorithm

scripts.dev:build-and-start: node ../scripts/setup-python-env.js && npm run build:career-fit-scoring && npm run build:electron:dev && concurrently "npm run dev:vite" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build:electron:dev: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(fs.existsSync('electron/electron-app/electron/main.js')){fs.copyFileSync('electron/electron-app/electron/main.js','electron/main.js');fs.copyFileSync('electron/electron-app/electron/preload.js','electron/preload.js');console.log('Copied compiled files to electron/');} if(fs.existsSync('electron/electron-app')){const {execSync}=require('child_process');execSync(process.platform==='win32'?'rmdir /s /q electron\\electron-app':'rm -rf electron/electron-app',{stdio:'inherit'});console.log('Cleaned up electron/electron-app/');}"
scripts.build:career-fit-scoring: cd .. && npx tsc && node scripts/copy-dist-to-src.js && cd electron-app
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:all && electron-builder
scripts.build:win: npm run build:win:installer && npm run build:win:patcher
scripts.build:win:installer: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('icon.ico')){console.error('ERROR: icon.ico not found!'); process.exit(1);} console.log('✓ Building Installer (with installation options)...');" && npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.build:win:patcher: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('icon.ico')){console.error('ERROR: icon.ico not found!'); process.exit(1);} console.log('✓ Building Patcher (auto-install for updates)...');" && npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --config electron-builder-patch.yml --publish onTag
scripts.build:win:both: npm run build:win:installer && npm run build:win:patcher
scripts.build:win:publish: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const iconPath=path.join(process.cwd(),'icon.ico'); console.log('Current dir:', process.cwd()); console.log('Looking for icon.ico at:', iconPath); if(!fs.existsSync(iconPath)){console.error('ERROR: icon.ico not found!'); process.exit(1);} console.log('✓ icon.ico found:', fs.realpathSync(iconPath));" && npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --publish onTag
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build:win && npm run generate-latest
scripts.build:win:complete: npm run build:win:publish && npm run generate-latest
